posts.post_title: The rest are off to ebay
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
I have the following T cards for sale.

All prices include first class shipping with delivery confirmation.

Looking for check or money order. I will accept Paypal but please add 3%

Email me at: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com

Emails have priority. First to contact me with intent to purchase gets the card(s).

Thanks for looking.


Thank you.  The following cards have been SOLD!

T206 Harry Steinfeldt (Portrait) with Brown Hindu Back. SGC 40. Great looking card. SOLD
